items.question: What types of images work best for reflections?
items.answer: High-quality images with clear backgrounds yield the best reflection results, though the AI can enhance various types. Aim for images that are sharply focused and well-lit.

items.question: Can I customize the reflection style and settings?
items.answer: Yes! Choose from multiple reflection styles and adjust settings like angle and opacity to match your desired look.

items.question: How quickly can I obtain my enhanced images?
items.answer: Image generation is typically instant, allowing you to download your enhanced product images in seconds.

items.question: Are there any limitations on usage rights for generated images?
items.answer: All images generated with the reflection feature come with commercial usage rights included, allowing for unlimited usage.

items.question: Do I need graphic design experience to use this tool?
items.answer: No, our tool is designed for ease of use. Simply upload your image and select your desired options.

items.question: What pricing model do you offer for reflection generation?
items.answer: WaveSpeed operates on a pay-as-you-go model, meaning you only pay for the reflections you create without any hidden fees.

items.question: Can I enhance multiple images at once?
items.answer: Yes, you can upload several images simultaneously and generate reflections for each in one go.

items.question: What support is available if I need help?
items.answer: We offer comprehensive support, including documentation, tutorials, and customer service via email and chat.
